items.title: New Buffett-Inspired ETF Holds Berkshire and Apple. It Aims for 15% Yield.
items.description: The ETF, which finished Wednesday at $19.15, is one of many that use the sale, or writing, of call options to augment income.

items.title: Why American Express Stock Bumped Higher on Monday
items.description: American Express is giving its Platinum cards an update.  With news of upcoming changes to its most popular product, American Express (NYSE: AXP) was a winner on the stock market as the trading week began.  Before market open, AmEx announced a series of major updates to its premium Platinum Card, a bonus-packed card that is its No. 1 product.

items.title: Coinbase Connection – And This Telltale Clue – Boost Financial Powerhouse
items.description: Set to launch the Coinbase One Card later this year exclusively on the American Express network, AmEx stock eyes a breakout.

items.title: Dow up 275 points on gains for shares of American Express, Goldman Sachs
items.description: Dow up 275 points on gains for shares of American Express, Goldman Sachs

items.title: American Express Planning 'Major Updates' for Platinum Cards Later This Year
items.description: The annual fee for an American Express Platinum card is $695. Don't expect that to last much longer.
